          <identifier>

          </identifier>
          <title>
            <string language="en">The Oceans floors.</string>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Die Ozeanfußböden.</string>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Les fonds océaniques.</string>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Os assoalhos de oceanos.</string>
            <string language="x-mt-it">I pavimenti di oceani.</string>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Τα πατώματα ωκεανών.</string>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Los suelos marinos.</string>
          </title>
          <language>en</language>
          <description>
            <string language="en">Animation of the earth which shows the outline of the oceans floors on a revolving globe.</string>
          </description>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">geology</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">oceanography</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>

          </keyword>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Animation der Masse, die die umreiß der Ozeanfußböden 
auf einer rotierenden Kugel zeigt.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Animation de la terre qui montre le contour des fonds 
océaniques sur un globe de rotation.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Animation da terra que mostra o esboço dos assoalhos de 
oceanos em um globo revolvendo.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Animazione della terra che mostra il profilo dei pavimenti
di oceani su un globo di giro.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Ζωτικότητα της γης που εμφανίζει το περίγραμμα των 
πατωμάτων ωκεανών σε μια σφαίρα.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Animación de la tierra que muestra el contorno de los 
suelos marinos en un globo que gira.</string>
          </description>
